A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is a lot of controversy for this one. Some thought it was crap and others thought it was good. Rotten Tomatoes have a Certified Fresh score and the audience review are in the upper forty percent. So went into this one with lowered expectations\, which is bad because it’s a Star Wars movie. I shouldn’t feel that at all about a Star Wars movie\, and after seeing The Last Jedi I really wasn’t. It was the best Star Wars movie\, but it wasn’t Attack Of The Clones bad. I liked what they did with the story\, it was thin but it worked. I liked all of the characters: Rey\, Finn\, Poe\, Kyle Ren along with Luke and Leia Skywalker. I didn’t like what they did with Luke’s character they made him weak. If they wanted to kill him off\, have him go out fighting and self projecting himself across the galaxy. It was my biggest gripe. And I’m sure it affected the audience score on RT. My other problem was the pacing of the movie. I didn’t the Finn and Rose story arc on the Casino planet. I thought it was unnecessary. But other than that\, it was a pretty good movie. Let’s hope J.J. Can tie up this new trilogy properly.
